snippet: James B. Comey’s handling of terrorism and insider trading cases in New York, which shaped his view of national security and law enforcement, provide clues to how he might lead the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
abstract: Profile of James B Comey, who has reportedly been selected by Pres Obama to be next chief of Federal Bureau of Investigation; Comey's handling of terrorism and insider trading cases as federal prosecutor in Manhattan, which shaped his view of national security and law enforcement, provide clues to how he might lead organization.
lead_paragraph: James B. Comey’s handling of terrorism and insider trading cases in New York, which shaped his view of national security and law enforcement, provide clues to how he might lead the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

headline.main: New York Tenure Shaped F.B.I. Nominee’s Security Views
headline.print_headline: New York Tenure Shaped F.B.I. Nominee’s Security Views
